in_favor: Intimate partner violence (IPV) is discussed in the text.

It is mentioned that women are more affected by IPV than men in some regions.
The text discusses the impact of socioeconomic factors such as education, wealth, and place of residence on IPV.
against: No clear arguments against intimate partner violence (IPV) are explicitly stated in the text.
